name: ContinuousCycling
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Looking for a reliable provider and source of cycling news? Continuous Cycling has you covered! This Skill will allow your Alexa to keep you updated on the latest cycling headlines around the world!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
